#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
int mod = 1000000007;
long long int power(long long int m,long long int n)
{
     if(n==0) return 1;
     if(n==1) return m;
     long long int ans = power(m,n/2)%mod;
     return (((ans*ans)%mod)*(power(m,n%2)%mod))%mod;
 }

int main()
{

    long long int fact[100001];
    fact[0] = 1;
    for(int i = 1;i<100001;++i){
        fact[i] = (fact[i-1]*i)%mod;
    }    
    int T,n,r;
    long long int ans,m;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--){
          scanf("%d%d",&n,&r);
          if(r > n){ printf("0\n"); continue;}
          m = (fact[n-r]*fact[r])%mod;
          ans = (fact[n]*power(m,mod-2))%mod;
          printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }     
    return 0;
}
